triples.evidence: You will use the MATLAB code available online to compute the Structural Similarity Index, or SSIM, between two images.
Your task is two-fold. First, compute SSIM for a pair of images-either the ones shown here or another pair of your choice.
design an example where sensitivity is 90% and specificity is 80%, and show your calculations.
design an example where sensitivity is 90% and specificity is 80%, and show your calculations.
